testcase.system-out: Given User invoking the browser.............................................passed And Navigate to the Amazon Home Page........................................passed When User accept cookies and click on Signin Option.........................passed Then Amazon Login Page is displayed.........................................passed When User enter priyankpatel48@yahoo.com and shankerji48 into the fields....passed And Click on Sign in button.................................................passed Then Amazon Account home page is displayed for valid user...................passed When User click on All option...............................................passed And Click signOut option....................................................passed Then User Sucessfully Signout...............................................passed
